distinct
from T_CUST_PREFERENCEADDRESS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_CUST_PREFERENCEADDRESS (FID, FCREATEUSERID, FCREATETIME, FLASTUPDATEUSERID, FLASTUPDATETIME, FSHUTTLEADDRESSID, FLINKMANID, FADDRESSTYPE, FADDRESS, FSTARTTIME, FENDTIME, FBILLREQUEST, FHASSTOPCOST, FPAYTYPE, FISSENDTOFLOOR, FOTHERNEED, FISMAINADDRESS, FSTATUS ) values (#{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flastupdateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fshuttleaddressid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flinkmanid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{faddresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fbillrequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fhasstopcost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fpaytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fissendtofloor,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fotherneed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fismainaddress,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.select:
select
from T_CUST_PREFERENCEADDRESS where flinkManId in (select t_cust_custlinkman.fid from t_cust_custlinkman where FCUSTID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) and FSTATUS in('0','2')

select
,t_org_department.fstandardcode as fdeptidStandardcode from t_cust_custbasedata join t_cust_custlinkman on t_cust_custbasedata.fid = t_cust_custlinkman.fcustid join T_CUST_PREFERENCEADDRESS on T_CUST_PREFERENCEADDRESS.Flinkmanid = t_cust_custlinkman.fid join t_org_department on t_org_department.fid = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.Fdeptid where T_CUST_PREFERENCEADDRESS.fid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
